suppress.comment: removing rows containing values along the following ICD9CM and ICD10CM parent codes using a lookup table for all concept_ids to be suppressed for drug_source_concept_id
suppress.on: exists (select * from `:idataset.drug_exposure` as record2 where drug_exposure.drug_exposure_id = record2.drug_exposure_id and drug_source_concept_id in (select concept_id from `:idataset.concept_ids_suppression`))

suppress.comment: removing rows containing values along the following ICD9CM and ICD10CM parent codes using a lookup table for all concept_ids to be suppressed for drug_concept_id
suppress.on: exists (select * from `:idataset.drug_exposure` as record2 where drug_exposure.drug_exposure_id = record2.drug_exposure_id and drug_concept_id in (select concept_id from `:idataset.concept_ids_suppression`))

suppress.comment: removing rows containing values along the following ICD9CM and ICD10CM parent codes using a lookup table for all concept_ids to be suppressed for drug_type_concept_id

suppress.comment: removing rows containing values along the following ICD9CM and ICD10CM parent codes using a lookup table for all concept_ids to be suppressed for route_concept_id
suppress.on: exists (select * from `:idataset.drug_exposure` as record2 where drug_exposure.drug_exposure_id = record2.drug_exposure_id and route_concept_id in (select concept_id from `:idataset.concept_ids_suppression`))
